quote: Self-supervised monocular depth estimation, a method for pixel-wise distance estimation of objects from a single camera without the use of ground truth labels, is an important task in 3D scene understanding.

We also perform a contrastive study on the architectures for the depth and ego-motion networks to evaluate their impact on the prediction accuracy, robustness to natural corruptions and adversarial attacks.
Digging into self-supervised monocular depth estimation.
